Echotest: FMSPy examples

More info about FMSPy at site.

Instructions:

  • Enter desired server location into field RTMP, for local installation it could be rtmp://localhost/echo. If you started FMSPy at different port (not 1935), please adjust url accordingly.
  • Press RTMP AMF0 or RTMP AMF3 buttons.

Echotest example SWF by Red5 project

.

You need JavaScript & Flash to run this example.
